donee.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone who receives money or other valuable things from another person
donee.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: All the property given to the donee by the donor will be subject to tax.
donee.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone who has been given a POWER OF ATTORNEY
donee.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: She was of sufficient capability to be a suitable donee.
